title: Auto-load images except in junk folder
creator: EinMaulwurf
content:
In thunderbird for android, there are currently three possible settings for loading images in mails: never load images, from contacts only or from anyone.

I'd like to have an option to auto-load images except for mails that are in the junk folder.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android
